name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poked - CRM and Inbox for LinkedIn

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your LinkedIn connections and messages: Create lists, notes, make deep searches, automate messaging, export data, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Poked is a CRM and Inbox designed to help you organize your LinkedIn professional network.

Getting work done on LinkedIn is hard: Attention-grabbing posts, clumsy interface, slow browsing: Professionals who want to network, sell, or hire, deserve a better way to organize their professional network.

â–  Your LinkedIn contacts relationship manager (CRM)

Browse your 1st-degree contacts in a beautiful and fast interface, scrape your LinkedIn contacts, and use advanced filters to understand your network.

ğŸ†“ Tags. Tag your LinkedIn contacts into lists.
ğŸ” Search. Use up to 18 filters to explore your network in-depth.
ğŸ—’ï¸ Notes. Take personal notes on your interactions with other LinkedIn users.
ğŸ’¾ Export. Easily export your contactsâ€™ complete data to CSV or JSON.
â™»ï¸ Bulk-disconnect. Clean your network and remove 100s of connections quickly.

â–  Organize your LinkedIn Inbox in a Gmail-like interface

Do all your LinkedIn messaging in a Gmail-like interface, allowing you to focus on work and process your messages more efficiently.

ğŸ“¨ LinkedIn Bulk Message. Reach out efficiently to your 1st-degree contacts.
ğŸ—‘ï¸ Bulk archive. Clean your LinkedIn inbox once and for all by archiving all your conversations in a couple of clicks.
ğŸ“‚ Folders. Organize your LinkedIn inbox into folders.
ğŸ—“ï¸ Snooze. Keep a clean inbox by snoozing your LinkedIn messages.
ğŸ“… Schedule DMs. Schedule your follow-ups to be sent at a later date.
âš¡ Filters. Quick access messages that require your attention.

â–  Start winning at LinkedIn: Get started today !

1. Download the Chrome extension.
2. Create a (free) Poked account. No credit card required.
3. Connect your LinkedIn account in Poked.
4. See all your messages and contacts in a new interface immediately!

ğŸ†“ Free plan vs Premium plan

Poked is Free (forever) for any basic LinkedIn actions. Bulk actions, such as bulk messaging, disconnecting, or archiving, are premium features. 14-day free trial no credit card required.

âš–ï¸ GDPR & Privacy

As a French company, Poked applies GDPR by default. Any account and related data will be deleted within 24h upon request. We do not sell your data to any 3rd-party and never will.

ğŸ“ Alternative to

Poked solves similar issues as products such as Waalaxy, Folk, LeadDelta, GetDex, with an emphasis on the LinkedIn 1st-degree network only and beautiful and fast design.
